name: Devil takes the Hindmost
info: 2x Handicap points race. First race is Limit & Semi Limit off at 6.45pm. Second race is Scratch & Semi Scratch off at 7.30pm
The points race will work that there will be several sprints (6 in first race, 8 in second race)
Points for 1st, 2nd and 3rd over the line in each of the sprints
All of the points you collect from all of the sprints will be accumulated to determine your overall position in the race
Handicap will be set so that Limit and Semi Scratch likely stay away for first couple of sprints
